languages.text: И тогда пришел он — Крик скверны. Древний и кровожадный хелбрут, беспощадный палач, выкованный из адамантиума и керамита. Штурм за штурмом он отражал в одиночку, перемалывая сотни солдат в кровавый фарш. Пока был жив этот монстр, мы не могли и надеяться пробиться в сердце вражеской цитадели.

And that's when it came. Doomscream. An ancient and bloodthirsty Helbrute, a merciless executioner forged from adamantine and ceramite. That single foe was repelling our assaults one after the other, turning hundreds of soldiers into a bloody pulp. For as long as that abomination lived, we had no hope of reaching the heart of the enemy citadel.
languages.original_text: И тогда пришел он — Крик скверны. Древний и кровожадный хелбрут, беспощадный палач, выкованный из адамантиума и керамита. Штурм за штурмом он отражал в одиночку, перемалывая сотни солдат в кровавый фарш. Пока был жив этот монстр, мы не могли и надеяться пробиться в сердце вражеской цитадели.

traits.locale_text: And that's when it came. Balescream. An ancient and bloodthirsty Helbrute, a merciless executioner forged from adamantium and ceramite. That single foe was repelling our assaults one after the other, turning hundreds of soldiers into bloody pulp. For as long as that abomination lived, we had no hope of reaching the heart of the enemy citadel.

That single foe was repelling our assaults one after the other, turning hundreds of soldiers into bloody pulp. For as long as that abomination lived, we had no hope of reaching the heart of the enemy citadel.

And that's when it came. Balescream. An ancient and bloodthirsty Helbrute, a merciless executioner forged from adamantium and ceramite. That single foe was repelling our assaults one after the other, turning hundreds of soldiers into bloody pulp. For as long as that abomination lived, we had no hope of reaching the heart of the enemy citadel.

And that's when it came. Balescream. An ancient and bloodthirsty Helbrute, a merciless executioner forged from adamantium and ceramite. That single foe was repelling our assaults one after the other, turning hundreds of soldiers into bloody pulp. For as long as that abomination lived, we had no hope of reaching the heart of the enemy citadel.

And that's when it came. Doomscream. An ancient and bloodthirsty Helbrute, a merciless executioner forged from adamantine and ceramite. That single foe was repelling our assaults one after the other, turning hundreds of soldiers into a bloody pulp. For as long as that abomination lived, we had no hope of reaching the heart of the enemy citadel.

And that's when it came. Doomscream. An ancient and bloodthirsty Helbrute, a merciless executioner forged from adamantine and ceramite. That single foe was repelling our assaults one after the other, turning hundreds of soldiers into a bloody pulp. For as long as that abomination lived, we had no hope of reaching the heart of the enemy citadel.

languages.text: 就在那个时候，“灾啸”出现了。它是一头古老而嗜血的地狱兽，一只用精金与陶钢铸成的无情刽子手。这头地狱兽仅仅凭借一己之力，就击退了我们无数次进攻，将数以百计的士兵碾成了肉泥。只要那头怪物还活着，我们就根本不可能抵达敌方要塞的核心区域。
languages.original_text: And that's when it came. Doomscream. An ancient and bloodthirsty Helbrute, a merciless executioner forged from adamantine and ceramite. That single foe was repelling our assaults one after the other, turning hundreds of soldiers into a bloody pulp. For as long as that abomination lived, we had no hope of reaching the heart of the enemy citadel.

traits.locale_text: 就在那个时候，“灾啸”出现了。它是一头古老而嗜血的地狱兽，一只用精金与陶钢铸成的无情刽子手。这头地狱兽仅仅凭借一己之力，就击退了我们无数次进攻，将数以百计的士兵碾成了肉泥。只要那头怪物还活着，我们就根本不可能抵达敌方要塞的核心区域。

languages.text: C'est alors qu'il est arrivé : le Fléau Hurlant, un vieux Métabrutus sanguinaire, un bourreau sans la moindre pitié, forgé dans l'adamantine et la céramite. À lui seul, cet adversaire repoussait nos assauts les uns après les autres, réduisant en bouillie sanguinolente des centaines de nos soldats. Tant que cette abomination restait en vie, nous n'avions aucun espoir d'atteindre le cœur de la citadelle ennemie.
languages.original_text: And that's when it came. Doomscream. An ancient and bloodthirsty Helbrute, a merciless executioner forged from adamantine and ceramite. That single foe was repelling our assaults one after the other, turning hundreds of soldiers into a bloody pulp. For as long as that abomination lived, we had no hope of reaching the heart of the enemy citadel.

traits.locale_text: C'est alors qu'il est arrivé : le Fléau Hurlant ; un vieux Métabrutus sanguinaire, un bourreau sans la moindre pitié, forgé dans l'adamantium et la céramite. À lui seul, cet adversaire repoussait nos assauts les uns après les autres, réduisant en bouillie sanguinolente des centaines de nos soldats. Tant que cette abomination restait en vie, nous n'avions aucun espoir d'atteindre le cœur de la citadelle ennemie.

languages.text: その時、それはやってきた。ドゥームスクリームだ。古代の血に飢えたヘルブルート、アダマンチウムとセラマイトで鍛えられた無慈悲な処刑人。たった1体の敵が次々と我々の攻撃を退け、何百人もの兵士を血まみれの肉片に変えていった。あの忌まわしきものが生きている限り、敵の城塞の中心部に到達する望みはなかった。
languages.original_text: And that's when it came. Doomscream. An ancient and bloodthirsty Helbrute, a merciless executioner forged from adamantine and ceramite. That single foe was repelling our assaults one after the other, turning hundreds of soldiers into a bloody pulp. For as long as that abomination lived, we had no hope of reaching the heart of the enemy citadel.

traits.locale_text: その時、それはやってきた。ベイルスクリームだ。古代の血に飢えたヘルブルート、アダマンチウムとセラマイトで鍛えられた無慈悲な処刑人。たった1体の敵が次々と我々の攻撃を退け、何百人もの兵士を血まみれの肉片に変えていった。あの忌まわしきものが生きている限り、敵の城塞の中心部に到達する望みはなかった。

languages.text: Y entonces llegó. Doomscream. Un Bruto Infernal, anciano y sanguinario. Un verdugo implacable de adamantino y ceramita. Un solo enemigo que rechazaba un asalto tras otro por su cuenta, reduciendo a cientos de soldados a papilla. Mientras esa abominación viviera, nos sería imposible alcanzar el corazón de la ciudadela enemiga.
languages.original_text: And that's when it came. Doomscream. An ancient and bloodthirsty Helbrute, a merciless executioner forged from adamantine and ceramite. That single foe was repelling our assaults one after the other, turning hundreds of soldiers into a bloody pulp. For as long as that abomination lived, we had no hope of reaching the heart of the enemy citadel.

traits.locale_text: Y entonces llegó. Balescream. Un Bruto Infernal, anciano y sanguinario. Un verdugo implacable de adamantio y ceramita. Un solo enemigo que rechazaba un asalto tras otro por su cuenta, reduciendo a cientos de soldados a papilla. Mientras esa abominación viviera, nos sería imposible alcanzar el corazón de la ciudadela enemiga.

languages.text: Und dann kam er. Unheilsschrei. Ein uralter, blutrünstiger Höllenschlächter, ein gnadenloser Henker aus Adamant und Ceramit. Dieser einzige Feind schlug unsere Angriffe reihenweise zurück, verwandelte hunderte von Soldaten in blutigen Brei. So lange diese Abscheulichkeit lebte, konnten wir nicht hoffen, das Herz der feindlichen Zitadelle zu erreichen.
languages.original_text: And that's when it came. Doomscream. An ancient and bloodthirsty Helbrute, a merciless executioner forged from adamantine and ceramite. That single foe was repelling our assaults one after the other, turning hundreds of soldiers into a bloody pulp. For as long as that abomination lived, we had no hope of reaching the heart of the enemy citadel.

traits.locale_text: Und dann kam er. Unheilsschrei. Ein uralter, blutrünstiger Höllenschlächter, ein gnadenloser Henker aus Adamantium und Ceramit. Dieser einzige Feind schlug unsere Angriffe reihenweise zurück, verwandelte hunderte von Soldaten in blutigen Brei. So lange diese Abscheulichkeit lebte, konnten wir nicht hoffen, das Herz der feindlichen Zitadelle zu erreichen.

languages.text: Tam o anda da o ortaya çıktı: Belanarası. Kadim ve kana susamış bir Tamu Kaçkını'ydı bu. Adamantin ve seramitten oluşan, merhamet nedir bilmez bir infazcıydı. Bu düşman; tek başına taarruzlarımızı birbiri ardına savuşturuyor, yüzlerce askeri kanlı posalara çeviriyordu. Bu garabet var olduğu sürece düşman hisarının kalbine ulaşmamız imkânsızdı.
languages.original_text: And that's when it came. Doomscream. An ancient and bloodthirsty Helbrute, a merciless executioner forged from adamantine and ceramite. That single foe was repelling our assaults one after the other, turning hundreds of soldiers into a bloody pulp. For as long as that abomination lived, we had no hope of reaching the heart of the enemy citadel.
